DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether injection Botulinum toxin type A muscle leg effective treat patient increase muscle tension/uncontrollable muscle stiffness ( spasticity ) stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Botulinum Toxin Type A Against Placebo Treat Spasticity Leg After Stroke
DOC.criteria: Age 1880 yr Lower limb spasticity Time since stroke great 3 month Need 400 U Botulinum toxin type A Body weight 50kg Fixed contracture low limb Generalized disorder muscle activity like Myasthenia gravis preclude use Botulinum toxin type A Infection injection site
